ref.mixed-citation: RoachREJRoshaniSMeijerKHamulyákKLijferingWMPrinsMH. Risk of cardiovascular disease in double heterozygous carriers and homozygous carriers of F5 R506Q (factor V Leiden) and F2 (prothrombin) G20210A: a retrospective family cohort study. British Journal of Haematology. (2011) 153:134–6. doi: 10.1111/j.1365-2141.2010.08529.x, PMID: 21275962
